title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Observe that the "Build" action is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
